# Flowers for the Queen

| length         = 60 mins
| guests         =
| prev           =
| next           =
| season_article =
| episode_list   =
}}
"Flowers for the Queen" is a 1958 British television play starring Tony Wright. It was based on a true story.
Plot
A British pilot in the war crashes in Holland and brings back a dutch daffodil.
Cast
*Tony Wright as Bob Hemming
*Zena Walker as Maryke Konigsveldt
*Mervyn Johns as Jan Konigsveldt
*Peter Collingwood as Steen
Reception
The Daily Telegraph felt it "fell well short... the story not only failed to hold the interest but failed to provide a single part worth playing."
The Evening Chronicle called it "a good play."
